summary: A small patch to revert Requiem's changes to vendor chests, making them again inaccessible.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][i][b][u][color=#1e84cc]Requiem - Vendor Chests Begone[/color][/u][/b][/i][/size]
[/center]
This is a small patch to rid the Requiem world of accessible vendor chests. Despite the intent of immersion, I found these chests to be somewhat jarring to my last Requiem playthrough. The problem is further compounded with how inconsistent container respawn can be, leading to potentially imbalanced games.

Ancillary items moved by Requiem to make room for these chests have been put back in their vanilla locations as well.

Load after Requiem and any USKP patches.
author: Drithius
